title: Springfield Armory National Historic Site: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Caution        Winter Closure Hotline  Alert 1 , Severity ,caution ,, Winter Closure Hotline  With winter weather a possibility, Springfield Armory has set up a Weather Delay/Closure hotline for up to the minute information.  Please call 413-734-8551 then enter extension 300 for weather updates.
